Reviews.Title: Happy with the Product
Reviews.Author: SMART SHOPPING
Reviews.Content: HTC myTouch 3G Unlocked Android Phone with 3G Support, GPS, and Touch Screen - US Warranty - White (Wireless Phone Accessory)Bought from seller "Xingdong"..very accurately describe the item..arrive quickly,well pack.My husband is having same unit over a 9 month and for me this one near 4 month.No issue or problem..Just simple..what I wanted.. :)

ProductInfo.Features:
This cell phone is Unlocked to work with GSM T-Mobile and Simple Mobile
Internal memory: Flash 512MB; RAM 192 MB DDR
Phone book entries: Up to 10, 000
Digital audio player compatibility: MP3, AAC, AAC+, WMA, WAV, AMR, OGG
Email: Gmail client for Gmail only; separate e-mail software app for accessing IMAP, POP3, Exchange mail
ProductInfo.Name: HTC MyTouch Magic 3G UNLOCKED for T-Mobile and Simple Mobile White
